description.raw:
This PR allows to drag fields from the scene tree widget into the plot widget. For now, I started with the `Pose3d` field.

You can test this by:

* Launching the topic interface example:

```
#!c++

  ign gui -c examples/config/topicInterface.config
```
* Increase the frequency to 1Hz and click `Publish`.
* Launch the plotting widget:

  
```
#!c++

ign gui -c examples/config/plot.config
```

* On the scene tree widget, expand `Model`, expand one of the three models received, expand `Pose`, and drag and drop any of the fields into the plotting widget. Note that these fields are initialized to 0, so nothing interesting should happen, but at least the plotting tool should start plotting the zeros.

Thanks to @iche033 and @chapulina for the help!

  • Launch the plotting widget:

  • On the scene tree widget, expand Model, expand one of the three models received, expand Pose, and drag and drop any of the fields into the plotting widget. Note that these fields are initialized to 0, so nothing interesting should happen, but at least the plotting tool should start plotting the zeros.

Thanks to @iche033 and @chapulina for the help!
